api/overview.title: API Documentation
api/overview.description: The Educational AI & Humanoid Robotics Platform provides a comprehensive API for interacting with educational content, robotics systems, and AI agents. This documentation covers all available endpoints and their usage.

intro/getting-started.title: Getting Started with the Platform
intro/getting-started.description: This guide will help you get started with the Educational AI & Humanoid Robotics Platform. By the end of this guide, you will understand how to navigate the textbook, interact with AI agents, and use the simulation environment.
